status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.

fields.description: As reported in the *FB SDK Best Practices for GDPR Compliance* (https://developers.facebook.com/docs/app-events/best-practices/gdpr-compliance) we should be able to delaying automatic event collection, and then enable logs by using *_setAutoLogAppEventsEnabled(true);_* after obtaining user consent.

comments.body: Hello [~astrovicapps], Thanks for the ticket. Our engineers will look into it.
